If you’d like, you can share a 2–3 sentence summary of your strongest, most relevant “shipped” outcome and the domain it was in, and I can confirm whether that maps to what we expect to hire for next cycle—but for this opening, we’re not planning to reopen evaluation.

If your hiring focus for this opening has shifted at all (or if you’re now considering platform/automation-leaning profiles), I’m happy to share a very concrete 2–4 week execution plan. If not, no worries—I’ll fully step back and reconnect next cycle as you suggested.
